Configuration GuideÂ¶

Environment Variables: - GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS: Path to the Google Cloud JSON credential file. - OPENAI_API_KEY: OpenAI API key.

Default Settings: - Store default configurations in config.py or .env files.

Customization: - Update Keyword List: Modify the machine learning model to include new keywords for detection. - Add new keywords in app.py. - UI Theme: Customize CSS files to modify the user interface. - Change Google STT Language Settings: For example, ko-KR to other language codes.
